Another list of descendants of Benjamin
Benjamin had five sons: Bela, Ashbel, Aharah,
The sons of Bela were Addar, Gera, Abihud,
One of Gera’s sons was Ehud.
The descendants of Ehud were leaders of their clans who lived in Geba
, but they were forced to move to Manahath
Ehud’s sons/descendants were Naaman, Ahijah, and Gera.
Gera was the one who led them when they moved to Manahath. Gera was the father of Uzza and Ahihud.
Another descendant of Benjamin was Shaharaim
. He and his wife Hushim had two sons, Abitub and Elpaal. In
, Shaharaim divorced Hushim and his other wife Baara.
Then he married a woman whose name was
: Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malcam, Jeuz, Sakia, and Mirmah. They were all leaders of their clans.
Elpaal’s sons were Eber, Misham, Shemed, Beriah, and Shema. Shemed built
Ono and Lod, and the nearby villages. Beriah and Shema were leaders of their clans, who lived in Aijalon
. They forced the people who lived in Gath
Beriah’s sons were Ahio, Shashak, Jeremoth, Zebadiah, Arad, Eder, Michael, Ishpah, and Joha.
descendants of Elpaal were Zebadiah, Meshullam, Hizki, Heber,
Another descendant of Benjamin was Shimei.
Shimei’s descendants included Jakim, Zicri, Zabdi, Elienai, Zillethai, Eliel, Adaiah, Beraiah, and Shimrath.
Shashak’s sons were Ishpan, Eber, Eliel,
Jeroham, whose sons were Shamsherai, Shehariah, Athaliah, Jaareshiah, Elijah, and Zicri.
In the records of these clans it is written that all those men were leaders of their clans, and they lived in Jerusalem.
, and he was the leader there. His wife was Maacah.
His oldest son was Abdon. His other sons were Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
and Mikloth. Mikloth was the father of Shimeah. All these sons of Jeiel also lived near their relatives in Jerusalem.
Ner was the father of Kish, and Kish was the father of
Saul was the father of Jonathan, Malchishua, Abinadab, and Esh-Baal.
Merib-Baal was the father of Micah.
Micah’s sons were Pithon, Melech, Tarea, and Ahaz.
Ahaz was the father of Jehoaddah.
Jehoaddah was the father of Alemeth, Azmaveth, and Zimri.
Zimri was the father of Moza.
Moza was the father of Binea.
The son of Binea was Raphah.
The son of Raphah was Eleasah.
The son of Eleasah was Azel.
Azel had six sons: Azrikam, Bokeru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah, and Hanan.
Eshek’s oldest son was Ulam. His other sons were Jeush and Eliphelet.
Ulam’s sons were brave warriors and ◄good archers/able to shoot arrows well►. Altogether they had 150 sons and grandsons.
Those were the descendants of Benjamin.
